name: gurps-gm-familiar
description: A GM assistant for GURPS games.

scripts.test: jshint lib test index.js && mocha -R spec test/models test/controllers test/index.js && npm run build && karma start
scripts.build: mkdir build; browserify lib/views/web/js/app.js -o build/app.js && node-sass lib/views/web/css/style.scss --include-path bower_components -o build && cp -r lib/views/web/html/* build && cp -r fixtures build
scripts.cov-html: mkdir build; jscoverage lib --exclude lib/views && NODE_DEBUG=true mocha -R html-cov test/models test/controllers test/index.js > build/coverage.html
scripts.coveralls: jscoverage lib --exclude lib/views && NODE_DEBUG=true mocha -R mocha-lcov-reporter test/models test/controllers test/index.js | coveralls

author: Diana Thayer <garbados@gmail.com>
